Research.title: Our Research
Research.subtitle: Rigorous, peer-reviewed research is at the core of Reliable AI.

paper1.title: Scalable and consistent few-shot classification of survey responses using text embeddings
paper1.description: We introduce a text embedding-based classification framework for efficient qualitative analysis of open-ended survey responses. Requiring only a handful of examples, this method integrates seamlessly into existing workflows and achieves performance comparable to expert human coders. It enables scalable, consistent, and audit-friendly analysis of thousands of responses.

paper2.title: Using Text Embeddings for Qualitative Analysis at Scale
paper2.description: We propose a novel technique for deductive qualitative data analysis using text embeddings. By representing text in a high-dimensional meaning space, we can quantify differences and model topics more flexibly than traditional methods. Validate against established datasets, our approach recovers key trends and offers a scalable solution for large text corpora.

paper3.title: DANTE: Deductive Content Analysis Using Text Embeddings
paper3.description: Traditional qualitative content analysis of text is labor-intensive. We introduce DANTE, a reliable and transparent few-shot tool that makes text embedding-based qualitative analysis more accessible. It enables researchers to perform large-scale deductive content analysis without extensive programming skills.

Team.title:
Meet Our

Reliable

People
Team.subtitle: As an inherently interdisciplinary team of researchers, we are committed to ethical and responsible AI usage. Our strong ties to philosophy and social science sets us apart.

descriptions.halvor: Background in physics and computational science. Specializes in text embeddings and the representation of meaning — with a particular interest in creative approaches to working with embedding spaces. The technical backbone of Reliable AI. When not coding, you'll find him on the cross-country skiing trails or at the bouldering gym.
descriptions.jonas: Background in philosophy and data science, with a strong foundation in statistics and theory. Has an eye for design and makes the solutions look good. When he's not working, you might find him on the basketball court or the football pitch.
descriptions.markus: Background in philosophy, AI, and ethics — with a particular interest in how language models represent concepts. Leads sales and marketing at Reliable AI. Tennis player and downhill skier of near-professional caliber.
descriptions.torole: Associate Professor of Physics at the University of Oslo. His research focuses on computational literacy, active learning methods, and using NLP for educational research — including text embeddings for qualitative analysis. In his spare time, he plays Norwegian folk fiddle, carves wood, and reads graphic novels.
descriptions.anders: Professor of Physics at the University of Oslo with research spanning geophysics, neuroscience, and artificial intelligence. Director of the Center for Computing in Science Education and experienced in bringing academic research to market. Currently chairs a national committee (Malthe-Sørenssen-utvalget) advising on how AI should reshape higher education. Runs on oatmeal.
descriptions.mathilde: Partner at Sprint Consulting with nine years of experience in innovation and sustainability consulting. Background from NTNU in computer science and strategy. Specializes in helping companies drive innovation, establish new ventures, and pursue sustainable growth.
descriptions.larspetter: 5x serial entrepreneur in EdTech. Co-founder and CPO of We Are Learning (immersive 3D learning). Previously co-founded Motimate, which was acquired by Kahoot!. His journey spans from CD-ROMs and laser discs to gamification and AI-powered immersive products. Known as a captivating speaker on creativity and AI.
descriptions.martine: Graphic designer with broad experience from the design agency WAL, among others. Brings a keen eye for visual communication and brand identity to Reliable AI. When she's not working, you'll find her at the gym or by the pool table.

Products.title: Our Products
Products.subtitle: Advanced AI solutions designed for precision, transparency, and reliability in legal and academic research.

kofa.title: KOFA Search
kofa.description: Navigate the complexities of public procurement with our specialized search engine for KOFA (Klagenemnda for offentlig anskaffelse) documents.
kofa.feature1: Advanced semantic search across the entire KOFA database.
kofa.feature2: Instant access to precedents and relevant case law.

dante.title: DANTE
dante.description: Deductive Content Analysis Using Text Embeddings. A reliable and transparent few-shot tool that makes text embedding-based qualitative analysis accessible to everyone.
dante.feature1: Perform large-scale deductive content analysis without coding skills.
dante.feature2: Few-shot learning capabilities for high efficiency.
dante.feature3: Transparent methodology grounded in academic research.

Testimonial.textBefore: We are proud to use award-winning, Norwegian-developed technology in practical legal work. The collaboration with Reliable AI has made it possible to develop a product for precise search in
Testimonial.textAfter: cases, simplifying our daily workflow. Reliable took the challenge head-on and developed a highly useful product in a short time through close dialogue with us.
Testimonial.author: Stian Hultin Oddbjørnsen
